Key Match Events: Draymond Green's foul against Zach Edey was upgraded to a Flagrant 1 after league review.
Draymond Green was ejected after receiving his second technical foul.
Zach Edey had 14 points and 10 rebounds, leading all rookies in double-doubles this season.
Draymond Green led the Warriors in rebounds, assists, and technical fouls with 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 7 assists.
Golden State Warriors won the game 123-118 against Memphis Grizzlies.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins expressed disappointment over the non-review of Draymond Green's foul on Zach Edey.
Zach Edey commented that the foul by Draymond Green was not a basketball play.
Golden State coach Steve Kerr got heated with officials at the end of the game.
